Leaderboard API
===============

This page documents the public API for the ``admet.leaderboard`` package.

The following sections document the modules that make up the leaderboard utilities. Use the module-level pages below for detailed API docs.

Configuration
-------------

.. automodule:: admet.leaderboard.config
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :noindex:

------

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

------

.. automodule:: admet.leaderboard.parser
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Report
------

.. automodule:: admet.leaderboard.report
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :noindex:

Plots
-----
